title: Reliance Power and its parent entity actively settling dues with lenders
description: Reliance Infrastructure and JC Flowers ARC had entered into a standstill agreement, according to notice issued to the exchanges on January 7. Initially, the standstill was until March 20, 2024, according to a separate stock exchange disclosure. "This was recently extended to March 31, 2024," said a spokesperson of Reliance Infrastructure.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
